title: Compiling error.
body:
I installed libcairo2-dev, using apt. However, I am still getting compiling errors, and I'm wondering what unmet dependencies I have. Here is the error:

```
g++ timing/timing.cpp -c -o timing/timing.o -I/usr/include/cairo -O3
g++ graphics/displayimage.cpp -c -o graphics/displayimage.o -I/usr/include/cairo -O3
g++ tree.cpp -c -o tree.o -I/usr/include/cairo -O3
g++ phys.cpp -c -o phys.o -I/usr/include/cairo -O3
g++ nbody.cpp -c -o nbody.o -I/usr/include/cairo -O3
g++ -O3 -lcairo -lm -lX11 -I/usr/include/cairo timing/timing.o graphics/displayimage.o tree.o phys.o nbody.o -o nbody
graphics/displayimage.o: In function `flush_input(XWin**)':
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x3c): undefined reference to `XFlush'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x54): undefined reference to `XNextEvent'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x60): undefined reference to `XPending'
graphics/displayimage.o: In function `create_key(char*, void* (*)(void*), void*, XWin**)':
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x219): undefined reference to `XStringToKeysym'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x228): undefined reference to `XKeysymToKeycode'
graphics/displayimage.o: In function `xwindow_init(int, int, int, XWin**)':
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x2ba): undefined reference to `XOpenDisplay'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x315): undefined reference to `XCreateSimpleWindow'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x333): undefined reference to `XInternAtom'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x350): undefined reference to `XSetWMProtocols'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x364): undefined reference to `XCreateGC'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x37d): undefined reference to `XSelectInput'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x38d): undefined reference to `XMapWindow'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x3a5): undefined reference to `XNextEvent'
graphics/displayimage.o: In function `xwindow_del(XWin**)':
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x420): undefined reference to `XFreeGC'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x430): undefined reference to `XDestroyWindow'
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x43c): undefined reference to `XCloseDisplay'
graphics/displayimage.o: In function `update_screen(XWin**)':
displayimage.cpp:(.text+0x8): undefined reference to `XFlush'
nbody.o: In function `main':
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x16a): undefined reference to `cairo_xlib_surface_create'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x183): undefined reference to `cairo_xlib_surface_set_size'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x18f): undefined reference to `cairo_create'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x1a6): undefined reference to `cairo_scale'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x1f2): undefined reference to `cairo_set_source_rgb'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x1fa): undefined reference to `cairo_paint'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x619): undefined reference to `cairo_set_source_rgba'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x637): undefined reference to `cairo_rectangle'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x63f): undefined reference to `cairo_fill'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x663): undefined reference to `cairo_set_source_rgba'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x691): undefined reference to `cairo_rectangle'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x699): undefined reference to `cairo_fill'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x8d8): undefined reference to `cairo_surface_write_to_png'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x9b1): undefined reference to `cairo_destroy'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0x9bd): undefined reference to `cairo_surface_destroy'
nbody.cpp:(.text.startup+0xa7a): undefined reference to `cairo_image_surface_create'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
Makefile:23: recipe for target 'nbody' failed
make: *** [nbody] Error 1
```
